Dumfries Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
dumfries-contest
None
Palmerston Park, Dumfries Prizes: £25 and cornet, £12 and cornet, £7 and trombone, £4, March contest: 1. Portobello Cornet solo: J. Roberts, Hawick Euphonium solo: J. Broadhead, Trawden 6 bands competed
April 11, 2012, 4:38 p.m. June 14, 2019, 12:08 p.m.
